page.title: 11Salfords Parcel Office
page.content: {Redhill Parcel Office}is situated at {Salbrook Road, Salfords,Redhill.}It is one of 32 parcel handling centres in the U.K.The Redhill office covers an area from Midhurst in West Sussex to Broadstairs on the East Coast,from Dartford,Kent to Eastbourne. 245 people work in 3 shifts, 7 days a week,coping with 275000 parcels each week.There are also 8 postmen to deliver local parcels. The parcels enter in trailers,are loaded onto conveyors to be sorted and coded.They continue along a conveyor to the loading bay and then transported to their destinations. There are 57 large vehicles to carry the parcels.The office takes and collects mail from 3 freightliner terminals in and around London:Stratford E.15, Willesdon N.W.10 and Kings Cross.
